com.sk89q.worldedit.util.formatting

Class StyleSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.sk89q.worldedit.util.formatting.StyleSet

  • public class StyleSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents set of styles, such as color, bold, etc.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StyleSet()
      Create a new style set with no properties set.
      StyleSet(Style... styles)
      Create a new style set with the given styles.

      • StyleSet

        public StyleSet(Style... styles)
        Create a new style set with the given styles.

        Style.RESET will be ignored if provided.

        Parameters:
        styles - a list of styles
